channel.title: Screen Rant
channel.description: All the latest movie news, movie trailers & reviews - and the same for TV, too.

item.title: 5 Best Theories About What Happened To Shauna's Baby In Yellowjackets
item.dc:creator: Kayleena Pierce-Bohen
item.description: Shauna found out she was pregnant with Jeff's baby after the crash, and fans have theories about what happened to it in the Ontario wilderness.
item.content:encoded: WARNING! Contains SPOILERS for Yellowjackets season 2!Yellowjackets season 2 has already answered a few big questions, including how the girls descend into cannibalism, but now theories have exploded about what happens to Shauna's baby. At seven months along, Shauna (Sophie Nélisse) could technically have the baby at any time, which presents a terrifying situation in a season already full of thrills, including the girls tearing into Jackie's (Ella Purnell) corpse after it's been smoked over a bonfire. With no sign of being rescued, the temperatures dropping, and tensions rising, winter in the Ontario wilderness isn't exactly the best environment for the Yellowjackets to welcome a baby into.

item.title: How 1000-Lb Sisters Could Have Led To Amy Slaton & Michael's Downfall
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Haggard
item.description: Amy and Michael Halterman share most of their lives on 1000-lb Sisters. Putting their marriage in the spotlight may be the reason for their divorce.
item.content:encoded: Fame can sometimes come at a price, and that just might be the case for 1000-lb Sisters star Amy Slaton and her husband Michael Halterman. The once seemingly happy couple is now headed for divorce, an ending they couldn't have predicted as they were building their life together. Unfortunately, deciding to live their life in front of the camera may have contributed to their ultimate downfall.

item.title: Bachelorette's Tayshia Cozies Up With Summer House's Luke Gulbranson
item.dc:creator: Jennifer O'Brien
item.description: The Bachelorette alum Tayshia Adams is spotted holding hands with Summer House star Luke Gulbranson, sparking rumors of a possible match.
item.content:encoded: Tayshia Adams from The Bachelorette was photographed getting cozy with Summer House's Luke Gulbranson in a now-edited Instagram photo. Luke was the heartbreaker of his Bravo show during his first season but later settled down, enjoying a more low-key love life. There could possibly be a crossover when it comes to finding the perfect match.

item.title: Every New Enemy In Genshin Impact 3.6
item.dc:creator: Bruno Yonezawa
item.description: Genshin Impactâ€™s patch 3.6 added a whole new bundle of enemies to the game, expanding a few existing enemy types and bringing new bosses to face.
item.content:encoded: Genshin Impact 3.6’s new enemies have finally been added to the game with the arrival of the update, offering players a fresh combat experience and a threat to ward off. The new creatures were previously leaked and then confirmed in Genshin Impact 3.6’s livestream. These higher-tier opponents are meant to be a challenge for more experienced players, as they are not so easily encountered.

item.title: Jeremy Renner Gets Standing Ovation At His New Disney Plus Show's Premiere
item.dc:creator: Brandon Louis
item.description: Hawkeye and Mayor of Kingstown star Jeremy Renner receives a standing ovation at the premiere of his new Disney Plus series, Rennervations.
item.content:encoded: Actor Jeremy Renner received a standing ovation at the premiere of his new Disney+ series Rennervations. The four-part documentary show sees the Mayor of Kingstown star locate decommissioned government vehicles and repurpose them to serve the community in a different way. From city buses to fire trucks, Renner plans, refits, and delivers redesigned vehicles to charities geared toward youths.

item.title: Vanderpump Rules: Katie Maloneyâ€™s 3 Best Looks After Divorcing Tom
item.dc:creator: Cher Thompson
item.description: Vanderpump Rules star Katie Maloney has been thriving since divorcing co-star Tom Schwartz in 2022. Check out some of her greatest single lady looks.
item.content:encoded: Vanderpump Rules star Katie Maloney has been serving some of the most incredible looks of her career since ending her marriage to Tom Schwartz. The couple, who had been together since 2011, divorced after nearly 5 years of marriage in 2022. While they planned to keep their split amicable, Tom has had some other priorities and ended up breaking Katie's trust by making out with fellow Vanderpump Rules cast member Raquel Leviss. This was the least of Raquel's problems, especially after the reveal of her long-term affair with castmate Tom Sandoval, but it did cause a huge rift in Katie's friendship with her ex-husband.

item.title: John Wick's Winston Arrives At The Continental In First Trailer For Prequel Show
item.dc:creator: Brennan Klein
item.description: Peacock reveals the trailer, release window, and official poster for The Continental, their upcoming three-part prequel series to the John Wick films.
item.content:encoded: The John Wick spinoff The Continental now has its first official trailer, revealing the return of Winston. The franchise began with the original 2014 action film John Wick, which followed a simple revenge tale when the titular ex-assassin (Keanu Reeves) was dragged back into the game when his dog was killed and his car was stolen. That film showed glimpses at a wide world of assassins on the fringes of society, including the mysterious hotel The Continental run by Winston (Ian McShane), which operates on a currency of gold coins and offers refuge to members of the community.

item.title: Why Dexter Peaked With Season 2 (Not The Trinity Killer)
item.dc:creator: Chelsea Escamilla
item.description: Dexter season 2 is arguably the best part of the whole show, not the Trinity Killer.
item.content:encoded: Dexter season 4 may be regularly regarded as the high point of the series with Jon Lithgow portraying the two-faced Trinity Killer, but Dexter season 2 is more suspenseful with greater implications for Dexter Morgan. Lithgow’s Arthur Mitchell carries himself as a family man and turns out to be an abusive husband and father with a dark, decades-long secret. Mitchell may change Dexter’s life forever, but Dexter’s life comes pretty close to being ruined in Dexter season 2.

item.title: New Girl: Why Damon Wayans Jr's Coach Left Again After Season 4
item.dc:creator: Adrienne Tyler
item.description: Damon Wayans Jr's Coach was introduced in the pilot episode of New Girl and left immediately after, only to return in season 3 and leave again.
item.content:encoded: Damon Wayans Jr’s Coach was one of the original residents of the loft in New Girl, but he left after the pilot episode. Wayans came back in season 3 and was promoted to a series regular in season 4, after which he left again. Created by Elizabeth Meriwether, New Girl debuted on Fox in 2011 and came to an end in 2018 after seven seasons. New Girl was very well received by critics and audiences, who praised the series’ sense of humor and the performances of the main cast, especially that of Max Greenfield, who was considered the breakout star of season 1.

item.title: 5 Best Vanderpump Rules Wedding Dresses Ranked
item.dc:creator: Jennifer O'Brien
item.description: Bravo's Vanderpump Rules has always been known for its eye-catching fashion, but which of its stylish stars had the best wedding dress so far?
item.content:encoded: With Scheana Shay's wedding to Brock Davies finally airing on the newest season of Vanderpump Rules, it's time to take a look back at all the past and present cast members' wedding day looks from worst to best. The Bravo series has always been a go-to source for the newest fashion, especially on the West Coast. The cast is always on point with their looks, whether it was the hottest leather mules or spring couture outfit.

item.title: Genshin Impact: Layla Hangout Event Guide & Rewards
item.dc:creator: Emmy Holthe
item.description: Layla's Hangout event in Genshin Impact includes six different endings and two hidden achievements as the Traveler helps Layla with her work.
item.content:encoded: Hangouts in Genshin Impact give players a break from monster grinding and dungeon crawling to spend some time with one of the wonderful 4-Star characters available for their parties. With Version 3.6, players get to hang out with Layla, the exhausted Rtawahist student with pointed ears, a Cryo Vision, and constant anxiety introduced in the Version 3.2 event Fabulous Fungus Frenzy.

item.title: Why Hailee Steinfeld Isnâ€™t Returning For Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
item.dc:creator: Cooper Hood
item.description: Hailee Steinfeld starred as Charlie in Bumblebee, and here is why is not returning for the franchise sequel, Transformers: Rise of the Beasts.
item.content:encoded: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts does not include Hailee Steinfeld's Charlie Watson despite her starring in Bumblebee; here's the reason why she is not returning. The Transformers franchise will continue to cycle through franchise-leading human characters with its seventh entry. Transformers: Rise of the Beasts continues the franchise in a 1994 setting that features Anthony Ramos and Dominique Fishback as the main human actors. They are joined by new Transformers factions in the Maximals, Predacons, and Terrorcons, but some familiarity will remain thanks to Optimus Prime and Bumblebee still leading the Autobots.

item.title: Join Jonathan Frakes & Star Trek's Fight Against Pancreatic Cancer
item.dc:creator: Dusty Stowe
item.description: Star Trek legends like Jonathan Frakes and Armin Shimerman are teaming up to raise funds and awareness in the fight against pancreatic cancer.
item.content:encoded: Star Trek veteran Jonathan Frakes is teaming up with some other franchise luminaries to continue the fight against pancreatic cancer. Frakes, along with Armin Shimerman, who played Quark for seven seasons on Star Trek: Deep Space Nine, and Shimernan's wife Kitty Swink, who guest starred on DS9, are coming together to raise funds and awareness for pancreatic cancer research. Star Trek: Enterprise star John Billingsley is also joining the effort, dubbed Trek Against Pancreatic Cancer.

item.title: Jeffrey Dean Morgan's The Boys Season 4 Character Revealed In BTS Wrap Image
item.dc:creator: Nick Bythrow
item.description: Karl Urban shares a photo featuring Jeffrey Dean Morgan's mysterious The Boys season 4 character in a behind-the-scenes filming wrap image.
item.content:encoded: Jeffrey Dean Morgan's mysterious character in The Boys has been revealed in a photo from star Karl Urban following season 4's filming wrap. The Boys season 4 began filming in late August 2022, with Morgan joining the cast as a mysterious new character. The new season is expected to explore a more unhinged Homelander and the consequences of Temp-V on Urban's Billy Butcher and Jack Quaid's Hughie Campbell.

item.title: Russell Croweâ€™s Nice Guys 2 Idea Is Terrible, But A Sequel Should Still Happen
item.dc:creator: Stephen Barker
item.description: Russell Crowe wants to make Nice Guys: The Mexican Detectives, which sounds ridiculous, but a sequel to the cult classic could still be incredible.
item.content:encoded: Russell Crowe has his own idea for a sequel to the cult hit The Nice Guys, and while it sounds ridiculous, The Nice Guys 2 should still be greenlit. The Nice Guys follows two private detectives, Holland March (Ryan Gosling) and Jackson Healy (Crowe), with extremely different work methods and personalities, and they're constantly locking horns when they're forced to work on the same missing person case. Gosling and Crowe have shockingly great chemistry together in the movie, and at the end of the film, Holland and Jackson put aside their differences and set up a detective agency together, teasing a sequel.

item.title: "He Did Save The World": Last Of Usâ€™ Ellie Has Surprising Take On Controversial Joel Decision
item.dc:creator: Brandon Louis
item.description: HBO's The Last of Us Ellie actor, Bella Ramsey, has a surprising take on Joel's controversial finale decision, stating, "He did save the world."
item.content:encoded: Spoilers for The Last of Us season 1 below!Bella Ramsey recently defended Joel's heart-wrenching decision in The Last of Us season 1 finale. Bella Ramsey stars as Ellie, a foul-mouthed 14-year-old orphan at the center of HBO's widely praised adaptation of the award-winning action-horror video game of the same name. When hardened black market smuggler Joel (Pedro Pascal) is tasked to safely escort the girl across a post-apocalyptic United States to the headquarters of a violent revolutionary group known as the Fireflies, the two form an unbreakable bond forged through their hardships.

item.title: VPR: Tom Sandoval's Family Refused To Meet Raquel Leviss During Affair
item.dc:creator: Amy DeVore
item.description: Before the Vanderpump Rules affair leaked, Tom Sandoval and Raquel Leviss traveled to Tom's home, where his family declined meeting his secret beau.
item.content:encoded: Three months prior to the world learning of an affair occurring between Vanderpump Rules stars Tom Sandoval and Raquel Leviss, the pair traveled to Tom's hometown of St. Louis for Christmas, where they spent time with his close friends but not with Tom's family, as they declined to meet Raquel. The aptly named "Scandoval" affair between Tom and Raquel became public knowledge this March, when Tom's phone fell out of his pocket during his band's gig and grabbed by his now-ex Ariana Madix. On Tom's phone, Ariana saw undeniable proof of the deception Tom and Raquel had created. After nine years together, Ariana abruptly ended her relationship with Tom.

item.title: Dotty & Soul Trailer Highlights Turns A Snack Vendor Into A CEO In New Comedy
item.dc:creator: Tatiana Hullender
item.description: Exclusive: Screen Rant presents the 1st trailer and official release date of Dotty & Soul, starring Adam Saunders, Leslie Uggams, and David Koechner.
item.content:encoded: Screen Rant is proud to present an exclusive first look at the trailer for the upcoming comedy Dotty & Soul, which finally has a release date after premiering at the 2022 San Diego International Film Festival. With Quiver as its distributor, Screen Rant can officially reveal that it will be arriving on digital platforms on May 19. Adam Saunders' feature film directorial debut, which he also wrote and stars in, explores cancel culture and genuine growth with humor and heart.

item.title: Why Supernatural's Crowley Calls The Winchesters Moose & Squirrel
item.dc:creator: Mae Abdulbaki
item.description: Supernatural's Crowley was always referring to Sam and Dean Winchester as Moose and Squirrel. We break down the reason behind the nicknames.
item.content:encoded: Crowley made his mark on Supernatural during its 15-season run, notably referring to Dean and Sam Winchester as Moose and Squirrel throughout. Crowley, a human-turned-demon and formerly the King of the Crossroads, played a crucial role in Supernatural, but he will always be remembered for the nicknames he gave the Winchester brothers. The reason behind Crowley calling the Winchesters Moose and Squirrel is an interesting one, and ties into the show’s overarching narrative, and explains the trio’s long-standing relationship.

item.title: Batman Closes His Oldest Plot Hole with the Perfect Explanation
item.dc:creator: Spencer Connolly
item.description: There has always been one major plot hole within Batman comics that fans have known about for decades, and now, Batman finally closes it--perfectly.
item.content:encoded: Warning! This article contains spoilers for DC/RWBY #2 Despite the fact that Batman is one of the greatest superheroes in comic book history and is perhaps the most popular one to date, the character does have one lingering plot hole that seemingly gets bigger with every passing day. However, that plot hole has officially been closed with one perfect explanation.

item.title: How To Tell If Someone Has A Snapchat+ Subscription
item.dc:creator: Kishalaya Kundu
item.description: Snapchat+ offers a range of exclusive features, but how can users tell if a friend has a premium subscription? There's more than one way to find out.
item.content:encoded: Snapchat+ is a premium subscription service, but how can users tell if someone they follow is a paid subscriber? The Snapchat subscription costs $3.99 per month and offers several exclusive and pre-release features, including the ability to change the app icon, see who rewatched a story, pin a friend as a BFF, view Friend Solar Systems, and customize notification sounds and background wallpaper in chats, among others.

item.title: 12 Behind The Scenes Details You Didn't Know About 8 Mile
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Meschutt
item.description: Movie fans often ask "Is 8 Mile a true story?" There are several interesting behind-the-scenes details from the film that show just how real it is.
item.content:encoded: When it comes to Eminem, one of his crowning moments was when he played a fictional version of himself, and there are a lot of 8 Mile behind the scenes stories that go along with that moment in his life. Eminem has so many pseudonyms and aliases that one wouldn't necessarily know what to call him if they were to run into him, including Marshall Mathers and Slim Shady. One name that comes to mind to many film fans is "Bunny Rabbit" from 8 Mile. It's been 20 years since director Curtis Hanson and Eminem gave the world one of the greatest underdog hip-hop movies of all time.

item.title: Mafia Mamma Review: Toni Collette Is Perfect As An Unexpected Mob Boss
item.dc:creator: Rachel Labonte
item.description: Even when it gets too slight for its own good, Mafia Mamma keeps things moving along at a brisk, entertaining pace that pushes its flaws to the side.
item.content:encoded: There are some movies that, just from the premise alone, sound like they'll be a blast. Catherine Hardwicke's new film Mafia Mamma is one such title, and it certainly leans into the silliness of its central conceit. In some ways, it's like wish fulfillment for anyone who has felt severely underappreciated in life, provided they don't mind some illegal activities. Even when it gets too slight for its own good, Mafia Mamma keeps things moving along at a brisk, entertaining pace that pushes its flaws to the wayside. Led by a delightful Toni Collette, this is one wild ride.

item.title: GT Confirms the Dragon Balls Can Create Gods of Destruction
item.dc:creator: Spencer Connolly
item.description: Very little is known about Gods of Destruction in Dragon Ball Super, but GT confirms that the Dragon Balls themselves have the power to create them.
item.content:encoded: Gods of Destruction are some of the most powerful beings in the entire Dragon Ball multiverse, and while no one really knows where they came from, Dragon Ball GT confirms that they can be created with the Dragon Balls (in one very specific instance).

item.title: The Sixth Sense Star Recalls Incredible Way Bruce Willis Helped Him On Set
item.dc:creator: Nick Bythrow
item.description: The Sixth Sense star Donnie Wahlberg remembers the incredible way Bruce Willis helped him on the set of the film, as well as how humble the actor was.
item.content:encoded: The Sixth Sense star Donnie Wahlberg reminisces about the way Bruce Willis helped him on set through his performance, as well as his humbleness surrounding the film upon its release. Wahlberg's The Sixth Sense character was Vincent Grey, a former patient of Willis' Malcolm Crowe who breaks into the child psychologist's home. The short scene sees Vincent shoot Malcolm and then himself, setting up an important twist for later in the film.

item.title: Where Is Reggie? - Why Charles Melton Is MIssing From Riverdale Season 7
item.dc:creator: Abdullah Al-Ghamdi
item.description: Riverdale season 7 showrunner Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa explains why a major character hasnâ€™t made an appearance, noting that there are a few reasons.
item.content:encoded: Riverdale showrunner Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa explains why season 7 is missing one important character. The long-running CW series is signing off in its typically outrageous fashion, as Archie, Veronica, Betty, and Jughead find themselves in the year 1955 after a critical battle and a deadly comet sent the group tumbling back in time and, specifically, back to high school. Amidst all the chaos, and with Jughead being the only person who remembers their past lives, the ensemble is missing a very familiar face.

item.title: Dredge: Obelisks Guide (Locations, Activations, & Uses)
item.dc:creator: Emmy Holthe
item.description: There are eleven black stone masses found throughout the world of Dredge known as obelisks. While inactive in the day, they trigger visions at night.
item.content:encoded: As players explore the world of Dredge, they will stumble upon strange black stones on some of the islands. These stones are known as obelisks. They are of the same stone found on Blackstone Isle, where players find the mysterious Collector. Upon finding an obelisk, players get the option to lay their hand on the stone. Nothing will happen unless players have a sufficiently high panic.

item.title: All 7 Marvel Movies Releasing In 2024
item.dc:creator: Felipe Rangel
item.description: 2024 is poised to be a great year for Marvel movies, with four releases from the MCU, two new Sony franchises, and a Spider-Verse return.
item.content:encoded: There are quite a few Marvel movies slated to arrive in theaters in 2024, with seven films between the Marvel Cinematic Universe, Sony's Spider-Man Universe, and the animated Spider-Verse franchise. While the MCU is the first thing that comes to mind to most moviegoers when it comes to Marvel, some Marvel movies that are not in the MCU — Sony's live-action expansion with Spider-Man-related characters — release in the coming years, and 2024 will see how well Sony's Marvel universe can sustain itself with lesser known characters. Sony's Spider-Man Universe has released three movies so far, with Tom Hardy's Venom franchise proving itself a success with audiences.

item.title: Star Wars Reveals 8 Connections From The Empire To The First Order
item.dc:creator: Nathaniel Roark
item.description: The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 has revealed new connections from the Empire of the original trilogy to the First Order of the sequels.
item.content:encoded: Warning! This article contains SPOILERS for The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7.

item.title: Bruce Leeâ€™s Iconic Enter The Dragon Fighting Trick Copies A Wild Real Legend
item.dc:creator: Brad Curran
item.description: In Enter the Dragon, Bruce Lee defeats one opponent using "The Art of Fighting Without Fighting", and this is based on a real martial arts legend.
item.content:encoded: A famous scene in the Bruce Lee martial arts classic Enter the Dragon is based on a real-life Japanese legend. After building himself into a star in Hong Kong with movies like The Big Boss, Fist of Fury, and The Way of the Dragon, Bruce Lee finally got his big break in Hollywood as the eponymous hero in 1973's Enter the Dragon. Lee would sadly pass away before the movie's debut, but Enter the Dragon would become an international phenomenon and posthumously made Bruce Lee into a martial arts movie legend.

item.title: 90 Day FiancÃ©: Mahogany Roca's 3 Most Interesting Instagram Posts
item.dc:creator: Saylee Padwal
item.description: 90 Day FiancÃ© star Mahogany Roca was always an open book on Instagram which made her social media interesting for viewers to keep up with.
item.content:encoded: 90 Day Fiancé star Mahogany Roca's Instagram page has been in the news for more reasons than one since her 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days debut with Ben Rathbun. Mahogany from Peru was introduced as 52-year-old Ben's online girlfriend, who he had been talking to for three months. While it may have looked like a real couple on the surface, Ben had never seen Mahogany or even talked to her on phone. Mahogany, who's 24 years old, looked too good to be true. Her photos were overly filtered, and she made excuses not to meet Ben when he visited her in Peru.

item.title: Queen Charlotte's Prequel Tease Fixes A Bridgerton True Story Complaint
item.dc:creator: Jessica Smith
item.description: Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Storyâ€™s teaser shows Charlotte and Georgeâ€™s relationship, and it already fixes a major Bridgerton true story complaint.
item.content:encoded: The teaser for Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Story shows the beginnings of Charlotte and George’s relationship, and fixes a Bridgerton true story complaint. Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Story will show Queen Charlotte and King George’s relationship, as well as the start of their reign together. It will add more depth to Queen Charlotte’s character and explain how she reinvented the Ton, as well as finally sharing King George’s life and showing who he was before his illness. King George and Queen Charlotte’s place in society will be a big part, but the main focus is on how their arranged marriage turned into a true love story.

item.title: Every PokÃ©mon Stadium Mini-Game, Ranked Worst To Best
item.dc:creator: Ryan Clouse
item.description: With PokÃ©mon Stadium coming back to the Nintendo Switch, its mini-games return once again. The best mini-games provide endless fun, and nostalgia.
item.content:encoded: One of the most memorable features of Pokémon spinoff game Pokémon Stadium is its assortment of mini-games. The classic Nintendo 64 title ignores exploration in favor of focusing on Pokémon Battles but fleshes things out with features like the Kids Club section. Nine mini-games allow those who are tired of repeatedly taking part in Gym Battles to take a break and unwind with some fun challenges. The best Pokémon Stadium mini-games, much like Nintendo's very own Mario Party, are quick and simple tasks where up to four players can compete for victory.

item.title: What's In Moff Gideon's Clone Tanks? 4 Compelling Theories
item.dc:creator: El Kuiper
item.description: The latest episode of The Mandalorian sees Moff Gideon claim that he has no interest in cloning, but that doesn't seem to be true. What is he hiding?
item.content:encoded: Warning! This article contains SPOILERS for The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7.

item.title: Air Beat Matt Damon & Ben Affleckâ€™s 25-Year Good Will Hunting Record
item.dc:creator: Jordan Williams
item.description: Air finally beats a record set by Good Will Hunting that Ben Affleck and Matt Damon's other collaborations over the past 25 years haven't reached.
item.content:encoded: Ben Affleck and Matt Damon’s latest collaboration Air has finally beaten a Rotten Tomatoes record previously held by their 1997 hit movie Good Will Hunting. As far as notable Hollywood partnerships go, Ben Affleck and Matt Damon are among the most notorious. After first appearing as extras in 1989’s Field of Dreams, the filmmakers went on to achieve widespread acclaim in the Oscar-winning movie Good Will Hunting, which they co-wrote and starred in together. The actors have since appeared alongside one another in projects like the Jay & Silent Bob movies, Ridley Scott’s The Last Duel, and the Affleck-directed 2023 sports drama Air.

item.title: My 600-Lb Life: Roni Dominguez' Scary Finger Injury Explained
item.dc:creator: Neha Nathani
item.description: Roni Dominguez admits in My 600-lb Life season 5 that she was abused by her husband, Michael Dominguez, who struggles with anger issues.
item.content:encoded: Michael Dominguez and his wife, Roni Dominguez, had a tumultuous journey on My 600-lb Life, including a fight that led the latter to lose her finger. The couple debuted in season 5 in 2017, when Michael was only 32. At the time, the Arizona native was over 635 pounds and was trying to become healthier. Alongside Michael, Roni was also a major part of the season, as she accompanied her husband in following Dr. Now's program. Together, the pair lost hundreds of pounds and had successful weight-loss journeys.

item.title: The Boys Season 4 Celebrates Filming Wrap With Blood-Splattered Photos
item.dc:creator: Brennan Klein
item.description: Showrunner Eric Kripke shares some photos in honor of The Boys season 4 wrapping, featuring bloodied-up stars Jack Quaid and Karen Fukuhara.
item.content:encoded: The Boys season 4 has officially wrapped production. The series, which premiered on Prime Video in 2019, is based on the Garth Ennis and Darick Robertson comic books of the same name, following a crass group of vigilantes attempting to take down a corrupt team of superheroes. The popular franchise rapidly expanded after 2019, airing two more seasons in the intervening years as well as the animated spinoff The Boys Presents: Diabolical.

item.title: The Praetorian Guards' Star Wars Return Fixes The Last Jedi's Mistakes
item.dc:creator: Nathaniel Roark
item.category: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
item.description: The sequel trilogy may have mishandled the Praetorian Guard, but their return to the Star Wars franchise fixes many of The Last Jedi's mistakes.
item.content:encoded: Warning! This article contains SPOILERS for The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7.

item.title: "It's Terrifying To Me": Chris Evans Gets Honest About Whether He'd Host SNL
item.dc:creator: Brandon Louis
item.description: Captain America star Chris Evans gets honest regarding potentially hosting an episode Saturday Night Live, calling the idea "terrifying."
item.content:encoded: Chris Evans recently discussed if he'd ever host Saturday Night Light, calling the idea "terrifying." Appearing in minor roles in both film and television early in his career, Evans became an instant household name when he joined the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) with Captain America: The First Avenger. He returned to the franchise for two sequels and four Avengers team-up films. Evans has since expanded his filmography, starring in Rian Johnson's murder mystery Knives Out, voicing the iconic space adventurer Buzz Lightyear in the character's first solo film, and leading in his first television series Defending Jacob.

item.title: Shailene Woodley Views Terrifying Footage In To Catch A Killer Clip
item.dc:creator: Tatiana Hullender
item.description: Exclusive: Screen Rant presents a clip from new thriller film To Catch A Killer, in which Shailene Woodley tracks down a deranged individual.
item.content:encoded: Screen Rant is pleased to present an exclusive clip from To Catch a Killer, a new thriller being distributed by Vertical. Serving as Argentine director Damián Szifron's English-language directorial debut, which he co-wrote with Jonathan Wakeham, the film releases in theaters on April 21. The story follows a female police investigator recruited by the FBI to profile and chilling murderer.

item.title: The Flash Season 9 Episode 9 Release Date (& Why It's On Hiatus)
item.dc:creator: Felipe Rangel
item.description: The Flash season 9 is on hiatus, with the next episode to air being episode 9, which brings the Arrowverse return of Stephen Amell's Green Arrow.
item.content:encoded: The Flash season 9, the show's final season, is currently on hiatus before a highly-anticipated episode 9. Grant Gustin has come a long way since entering the Arrowverse in a small role during Arrow season 2. First appearing as Barry Allen in the show that started the Arrowverse, the actor soon got to lead his own spinoff series. After nine seasons, Gustin's The Flash is coming to an end, with a final season that has explored some of the fan-favorite aspects of the Arrowverse.

item.title: Every George Clooney & Julia Roberts Movie Ranked
item.dc:creator: Zachary Moser
item.description: George Clooney and Julia Roberts have been cast in five movies together, and the mega-movie stars combine their charisma to boost whatever they're in.
item.content:encoded: Julia Roberts and George Clooney have appeared together in a number of movies over their illustrious careers and developed a real and magnetic chemistry along the way. Roberts and Clooney rose to mega-stardom around the same time period in the mid-'90s. Roberts' breakthrough came in 1989 with Steel Magnoliasâ€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹, for which she was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress and won the Golden Globe in the same category. Clooney's rise to prominence came with his portrayal of Doug Ross on ER.

item.title: 14 Best Battlefield Games, Ranked
item.dc:creator: Matthew Flores
item.description: From games set during World War 1 to those taking place decades in the future, the Battlefield franchise has released many hit multiplayer shooters.
item.content:encoded: The Battlefield franchise has expanded continuously from its humble roots as a PC-exclusive series, but the best Battlefield games can be found from across all the years of the franchise. Originally debuting in 2002, the EA and DICE-developed FPS franchise has seen quite a few changes, taken place in multiple different historical eras, and attracted a major following on consoles as well. Battlefield games have never been afraid to change up elements of style and setting, but some risks have paid off more than others.

item.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer Has A Horror Reboot Villain Problem
item.dc:creator: Adrienne Tyler
item.category: I Know What You Did Last Summer
item.description: I Know What You Did Last Summer's legacy sequel is already facing a big villain problem thanks to what happened to Ben Willis in the sequel.
item.content:encoded: I Know What You Did Last Summer is preparing to join the trend of legacy horror movies, but its upcoming movie is already facing a big horror reboot villain problem. The horror genre is still riding the wave of reboots and requels, and among those confirmed to be in the process of being rebooted is I Know What You Did Last Summer. Directed by Jim Gillespie and loosely based on the 1973 novel of the same name by Lois Duncan, I Know What You Did Last Summer was released in 1997 and helped revitalize the slasher genre in the 1990s, but after a failed direct-to-video sequel and a TV series, the franchise has struggled to stay relevant.

item.title: New All-Female X-Men Team Embarks On Magical Quest Across Thor's Ten Realms
item.dc:creator: Alex Schlesinger
item.description: The upcoming Realm of X series will see Magik, Mirage, Dust, Marrow, Typhoid Mary, and Curse embark on a mystical quest through Asgard's Ten Realms.
item.content:encoded: Marvel Comics recently revealed an exciting new X-Men title in the upcoming Fall of X era, titled Realm of X, which will follow an all-female team of Krakoan mutants as they embark on a magical quest through the Ten Realms of Thor's cosmology.

item.title: Mila Kunis Is (Sort Of) Wrong About That â€˜90s Showâ€™s Jackie & Fez Twist
item.dc:creator: Cathal Gunning
item.description: Jackie and Fez did end up together in That '70s Show's finale but, despite Mila Kunis's claims, their breakup before That '90s Show makes does sense.
item.content:encoded: While That ‘90s Show did technically explain what happened to Fez and Jackie’s relationship after That ‘70s Show’s finale, Mila Kunis is still half-right about the timeline not making much sense. Like any sitcom reboot, Netflix’s That ‘90s Show needed to change up some details of That ‘70s Show’s canon. The reboot depicted Kelso and Jackie (re-)married with children, but one star of That ‘70s Show correctly noted that this didn’t quite add up. However, there was a justification for the choice nonetheless.

item.title: Darcey & Stacey Star Georgi Rusev's 5 Worst Fashion Fails On Instagram
item.dc:creator: Maggie Mead
item.description: Darcey & Stacey star Georgi wants to be a model. But some of his fashion looks are so questionable that even Darcey seemingly has more style sense.
item.content:encoded: Though Georgi Rusev of Darcey & Stacey fame aspires to be a model, that doesn’t mean his fashion sense is always on point. After two failed relationships with Jesse Meester and Tom Brooks, 90 Day Fiancé’s Darcey Silva began dating Bulgarian man Georgi. While Darcey and Georgi’s relationship was extremely rocky, the couple eventually got engaged—though it didn’t last. Darcey and Georgi called off their engagement, but in recent episodes of Darcey & Stacey, Georgi is trying to win back Darcey.

item.title: One House Of The Dragon Actor Is Missing From The Season 2 Cast List
item.dc:creator: Dan Zinski
item.description: Filming on HBO's House of the Dragon season 2 is getting underway, but one key season 1 actor is revealed to be missing from the cast list.
item.content:encoded: One key House of the Dragon actor is revealed to be missing from the season 2 cast list. After the massive worldwide success of Game of Thrones, the pressure was on for HBO to keep the ball rolling with a spinoff show that gave viewers the same epic fantasy experience as the original series. The result of the network’s efforts, House of the Dragon, finally arrived in 2022, bringing even more fire-breathing dragons than Game of Thrones, along with a healthy dose of family drama and political intrigue.

item.title: The Last Kingdom Movie Can Still Tell The Books' Saddest Story
item.dc:creator: Henry Ladd
item.category: The Last Kingdom: Seven Kings Must Die
item.description: The Last Kingdom's movie, Seven Kings Must Die, can include this terribly sad moment from Bernard Cornwell's novel series, The Saxon Stories.
item.content:encoded: The Last Kingdom's movie, Seven Kings Must Die, can still tell the book series' saddest story. The Last Kingdom, based on Bernard Cornwell's novel series, The Saxon Stories, has covered most of the major turning points of the book series, however, one of the books' saddest moments has not yet been included in the show. With The Last Kingdom: Seven Kings Must Die set to wrap up The Last Kingdom's story, the Netflix original film represents the last chance to tell this story on screen.

item.title: Will Luke's Force Ghost Be In Rey's Star Wars Movie? Lucasfilm Head Responds
item.dc:creator: Ana Dumaraog
item.description: Lucasfilm head Kathleen Kennedy comments on the possibility of Mark Hamill's Force ghost appearing in Daisy Ridley's Star Wars: New Jedi Order.
item.content:encoded: Will Luke's Force ghost appear in Star Wars: New Jedi Order, Lucasfilm's Kathleen Kennedy responds. Legendary Jedi Luke Skywalker had been one of, if not the primary protagonist of the franchise since it started back in the '70s. Luckily, despite his death in Star Wars: The Last Jedi, Mark Hamill can continue to appear as the character thanks to the concept of Force ghosts.

item.title: Tchia: How to Find Gaby's Treasure
item.dc:creator: Matthew Danielson
item.description: The open-world adventures of Thcia sees players try to find different treasure for cosmetic items, including one found through a map given by Gaby.
item.content:encoded: The open world of Tchia hosts tons of treasure for players to find throughout their adventure, including a special chest that can be found using a map given by the NPC Gaby near the start of the game. A resident of Weliwele, Gaby greets players within one of the first main quests, requesting some crabs in exchange for a treasure map. Leaving this area after collecting the crabs on the following day sees Gaby give the map and a key to open the chest for their potential treasure.

item.title: Assassin's Creed: Black Flag Sails to East Asia For WEBTOON Sequel Series
item.dc:creator: Samantha King
item.description: A new webcomic is adding onto the story begun in Ubisoft's Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag, thanks to a partnership with Webtoon and REDICE Studio.
item.content:encoded: A new Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag-centered webcomic is coming to Webtoon. Assassin's Creed: Forgotten Temple is the result of a partnership between the comic publisher, Ubisoft, and REDICE Studio. The story will bring fans more of Edward Kenway, the protagonist of the game that inspired it.

item.title: When Will Renfield Release On Streaming?
item.dc:creator: Jordan Williams
item.description: Universal's Dracula film starring Nicolas Cage and Nicholas Hoult premieres in theaters April 14. Here's when Renfield is expected to start streaming.
item.content:encoded: Universal’s monster movie Renfield is set to scare up the box office after its April 14 theatrical premiere, but when will it release on streaming? Renfield is Universal’s latest Dracula adaptation that serves as a sequel to the studio's classic 1931 movie starring Bela Lugosi, but this modern horror-comedy focuses on the vampire’s loyal yet tortured titular henchman. With Nicolas Cage playing the terrifying Count Dracula, Awkwafina playing a local New Orleans traffic cop, and Nicholas Hoult starring as Renfield, the horror comedy has the potential to reboot the Dark Universe.

item.title: "Yes, Yes, Yes, Yes, Yes!": Star Wars Fans Love Grogu's Shocking Change In The Mandalorian
item.dc:creator: Marcelo Leite
item.description: The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 just made Grogu way cooler and more powerful by giving him something even Star Wars fans didn't expect!
item.content:encoded: WARNING: This article contains SPOILERS for The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7.

item.title: The Shining Ending Explained: Why Jack Is In The Photo
item.dc:creator: Adrienne Tyler
item.description: One of the many mysteries of Stanley Kubrick's The Shining is why Jack appears in the photo at the end, and it actually has a semi-simple explanation.
item.content:encoded: Stanley Kubrick’s The Shining is regarded by many as one of the greatest films ever made, and one that to this day continues to be the subject of many debates and discussions. Kubrick deliberately didn't explain The Shining's ending during the film, but he did, however, later explain why Jack Torrance appears in The Shining picture at the end. Based on the book of the same name by Stephen King, The Shining follows Jack Torrance (Jack Nicholson), an aspiring writer and recovering alcoholic who takes a job as the off-season caretaker of the Overlook Hotel. Jack takes his wife, Wendy (Shelley Duvall), and their son, Danny (Danny Lloyd), with him, but little do they know, the Overlook has some dark secrets of its own. Triggered by Danny’s psychic abilities, the hotel releases some dangerous supernatural forces that mess with Jack’s sanity — and the safety of Wendy and Danny.

item.title: Fast X Is Putting A Dramatic Twist On A Typical Street Race, Teases Director
item.dc:creator: Ryan Northrup
item.description: Director Louis Leterrier teases that a street race in Fast X will be different from those in past Fast & Furious movies because of one big twist.
item.content:encoded: Fast X director Louis Leterrier teases that the upcoming Fast & Furious sequel will be putting a dramatic twist on the franchise's typical street race. After the Fast & Furious franchise first got its start back in 2001, Fast X will serve as the penultimate installment, pitting Dominic Toretto (Vin Diesel) and his crew against a new villain in the form of Jason Momoa's Dante. Leterrier has already revealed that the sequel will go back to the franchise's street racing roots in some ways but now teases that there will be one big difference.

item.title: How Many Episodes Yellowjackets Season 2 Has Left
item.dc:creator: Jordan Williams
item.description: The mysteries in Yellowjackets season 2 become more bizarre with each chapter, but there are only a few more episodes left until the finale arrives.
item.content:encoded: Yellowjackets season 2 is nearing its highly anticipated finale episode with only a few installments remaining. Following the Showtime series’ critically acclaimed inaugural season, Yellowjackets season 2 debuted to record-breaking viewership numbers by doubling the original pilot’s ratings. In addition to maintaining the freshman season’s critical popularity, Yellowjackets season 2 is increasing the stakes as each new episode sees the teenage and adult versions of the survivors descend deeper into desperation, setting the stage for a climactic and shocking finale.

item.title: The Marvels: Why Nick Fury Is In Space & How Long He's Been There
item.dc:creator: Charles Nicholas Raymond
item.description: The Marvels trailer confirms that Samuel L. Jackson's Nick Fury is on a space station. Here's what's known about how long he's been up there and why.
item.content:encoded: The Marvels trailer confirms that the MCU’s Nick Fury is still in outer space. Of course, this isn’t the first tease of the character’s off-world activities. Spider-Man: Far From Home previously revealed that Samuel L. Jackson’s character secretly left Earth and relocated to spaceship.

item.title: FF7 Rebirth's Combat May Be Bad News For Everyone Who Loved FF7 Remake
item.dc:creator: Lee D'Amato
item.description: FF7 Remake was widely praised for its fast-paced combat system, but Rebirth is bringing back a more controversial feature from earlier in the series.
item.content:encoded: Changes and updates recently announced for Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth's combat system could be unpopular among players who fell in love with Final Fantasy 7 Remake. FF7 Remake was widely praised following its 2020 release for updating and expanding on the hit 1997 RPG. For the first time ever, players could explore the gritty urban sprawl of Midgar in full 3D, while a faithful adaptation of the original FF7's score set the mood for adventure. The combat system of FF7 Remake was lauded for its fast-paced, real-time action, granting players adaptability by allowing them to switch control of characters on the fly.

item.title: Think Rainbow Road Is Hard In Mario Kart? Super Mario Movie Makes It WAY Worse
item.dc:creator: Brad Curran
item.description: Rainbow Road is featured in The Super Mario. Bros. Movie, and while it's a tough level in Mario Kart, the movie makes it far more challenging.
item.content:encoded: Rainbow Road is featured in The Super Mario Bros. Movie, and it is a far greater challenge than in the Mario Kart games. In The Super Mario Bros. Movie, Mario (Chris Pratt) and Luigi (Charlie Day) are trying to get their plumbing business up and running when they suddenly find themselves whisked away to the Mushroom Kingdom. After Luigi is kidnapped by the underlings of Bowser (Jack Black), Mario and Princess Peach (Anya Tylor-Joy) join forces to save Luigi and stop Bowser's plot to conquer the Mushroom Kingdom.

item.title: Can The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 Measure Blood Pressure In The U.S.?
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scotting
item.description: The Galaxy Watch 4 has tons of health tracking features, including blood pressure monitoring. Unfortunately, U.S. users still can't access it.
item.content:encoded: One of the best health features of Samsung's Galaxy Watch 4 is its ability to track users' blood pressure, but unfortunately, it's something buyers in the U.S. still don't (officially) have access to. A big selling point of the Galaxy Watch 4 is blood pressure tracking. Galaxy Watch 4 users can quickly check their blood pressure at any time with the Samsung Health Monitor app — something the Apple Watch isn't even capable of.

item.title: Killer Frequency Preview: Horror With A New Spin [EXCLUSIVE]
item.dc:creator: Deven McClure
item.description: Killer Frequency is a unique first-person horror title where players will help callers avoid a murderer as they work their shift as a radio DJ.
item.content:encoded: Killer Frequency is a first-person horror adventure where players try to save a small town from a vengeful killer. The upcoming title comes from developer Team17, which in the past produced titles like Overcooked 2 and the Worms franchise. Screen Rant recently had the opportunity to experience a hands-on preview with Killer Frequency that showed off its puzzles, black-comedy elements, and 1980s setting.

item.title: Did Star Trek's Section 31 Exist In The Original Series?
item.dc:creator: Dusty Stowe
item.description: The controversial Section 31 has become a mainstay of modern Star Trek stories, but did it exist in the days of Star Trek: The Original Series?
item.content:encoded: The controversial Section 31 has become a mainstay of modern Star Trek stories, but did it exist in the days of Star Trek: The Original Series? Section 31 was created for Star Trek: Deep Space Nine, the dark underbelly of Starfleet that went to extreme lengths to protect the citizens of the United Federation Of Planets, lengths that were often deeply immoral and against the Federation's values. Section 31 notably unleashed a morphogenic virus on the Changelings during the Dominion War, which remains a controversial decision.

item.title: Superman's Villains Finally Have a Power Upgrade He Can't Match
item.dc:creator: Dashiel Reaves
item.description: Superman is one of the most powerful heroes in the entire DC Universe, and his villains are finally learning how to beat him with one new trick.
item.content:encoded: Warning! Contains spoilers for Superman #2 and Action Comics #1053!Superman is by far one of the most powerful heroes to ever protect Earth, and naturally his villains need to be powerful to try and pose any kind of threat to him. Recently, though, it seems that Superman's villains have learned how to finally surpass the Man of Steel with strength in numbers.

item.title: Best Arcade-Style Video Games (Updated 2023)
item.dc:creator: Diz Isola Helde
item.description: Are you ready for a throwback? Let's get gaming. Check out the best arcade-style video games you can play right now.
item.content:encoded: Decades ago, video games cut their teeth in the cramped darkness of arcades around the world. While the gaming industry may have started with computers and proprietary tech, and later come into its own on the home console market, the arcade era was where it truly established its footing in our popular consciousness. Many of the tropes, aesthetic ideas, and early genre conventions that would carry over to the home console market that now dominates the industry were established within those challenging, fun-first, coin-fed game cabinets of yesteryear.

item.title: Stranger Things Season 5 Doesn't Need Main Character Deaths To Be Good
item.dc:creator: Tiffany Beverley
item.description: The main characters' fates in the final season of the Stranger Things have been speculated, but the show doesn't need these deaths to be good.
item.content:encoded: Stranger Things season 5 looks like it will be the most exciting installment of the Netflix series yet, and it doesn't need main character deaths to be good. Stranger Things season 4 has set the groundwork for a compelling fifth season thanks to Vecna opening the gate that separates Hawkins, Indiana, from the Upside Down. The final season of Stranger Things has been highly anticipated, with plenty of speculation about what characters will meet their untimely end. However, the Duffer brothers may choose to spare the main Hawkins gang—which wouldn't necessarily be bad.

item.title: Young Sheldon Season 6 Episode 17 Clip Spoils Missyâ€™s Post-Arrest Fate
item.dc:creator: Ana Dumaraog
item.description: CBS releases a brand new promotional clip for Young Sheldon season 6 episode 17 spoiling Missy's frustrating fate after she was arrested.
item.content:encoded: Missy's post-arrest fate is revealed in a new Young Sheldon season 6, episode 17 clip. After another short hiatus, The Big Bang Theory prequel is returning with a fresh episode, moving forward the Coopers' stories as the show enters its final stretch.

item.title: How The Gelatinous Cube Works In D&D: Honor Among Thieves (& Why It Burns)
item.dc:creator: Michelle Boyar
item.description: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves features many different D&D creatures, including a strange, giant gelatinous cube, but how does the cube work?
item.content:encoded: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves showcased many different creatures from the D&D universe including the mysterious gelatinous cube. Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves cinematically revisited the D&D universe to critical and audience acclaim. With a sharp mix of comedy and fantasy-action, Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves brings both D&D players and movie-going audiences together to enjoy this entertaining tale. Honor Among Thieves follows the tale of Edgin the Bard (Chris Pine) and Holga the Barbarian (Michelle Rodriguez) as they try to save Edgin’s daughter Kira (Chloe Coleman) from their ex-partner-in-crime Forge (Hugh Grant). In so doing, the movie features a raft of extraordinary creatures and obstacles.

item.title: What The Crows Mean In Netflix's Beef
item.dc:creator: Greg MacArthur
item.description: Crows reoccur throughout Netflix and A24's new show Beef and they hold an important meaning for the characters.
item.content:encoded: WARNING! Contains SPOILERS for Beef on Netflix!The season finale of Netflix's Beef brought the show to a new surrealist territory, specifically with its opening scene of two crows talking to each other about Amy and Danny. One of the crows remembers Danny for feeding him once, while the other recalls that Amy scared its uncle when she pointed a gun at it after Danny shockingly urinated on Amy's bathroom floor. The crows comically hold a vote to declare Amy's offense as an act of war, cawing in agreement that she is now one of their enemies. Other brief moments in Beef that include crows allude to broader themes that contribute to season 1's narrative.

item.title: Star Trek Confirms a Shocking Limit to a God-Like Species' Power
item.dc:creator: Adam J. Brunner
item.description: Star Trek's god-like entities the Bajoran Prophets are usually seen as good and omniscient, but they may be hiding a new secret.
item.content:encoded: Warning: Spoilers for Star Trek #5!Star Trek has had many godlike beings in the long run of the franchise, but perhaps the most well explored are the ones known as the Bajoran Prophets. These beings claim to be all knowing, but the most recent issue of IDW Publishing's comic run is putting that into serious doubt.

item.title: The MCU's Ten Rings Come From Kang - Shang-Chi Theory Explained
item.dc:creator: David Miller
item.category: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
item.description: The origin of the Ten Rings in Shang-Chi are shrouded in mystery, but they seem to be tied to another reality, and might have belonged to Kang.
item.content:encoded: The origin of the legendary Ten Rings in Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings are shrouded in mystery, but one theory suggests they could come from Kang the Conqueror. With Thanos dead and the Infinity Stones gone in the main MCU timeline, Phase 4 introduced new threats on a larger scale than the Infinity Saga. This includes He Who Remains in Loki season 1, and Xu Wenwu, the true leader of The Ten Rings crime organization. Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings' eponymous weapons could be tied to the greater MCU narrative through a powerful being like Kang the Conqueror.

item.title: Destiny 2: How To Get Nameless Midnight (& God Roll)
item.dc:creator: Bruno Yonezawa
item.description: Nameless Midnight is an overlooked Scout Rifle in Destiny 2, but it is great for PvE and PvP activities. Hereâ€™s where it drops and its God Rolls.
item.content:encoded: Destiny 2’s Nameless Midnight Scout Rifle is one of the best in the category, both for PvE and PvP activities. When aligned with the proper perks and God Roll for each type of activity, players can significantly improve their performances. The weapon was actually introduced back in Season 1, but after being sunset, it came back with Lightfall’s Season 20, updated with new perks that match the current environment in the shooter.

item.title: The 1 Grey's Anatomy Character Shonda Rhimes Regrets Killing
item.dc:creator: Adrienne Tyler
item.description: Grey's Anatomy has seen many tragic deaths, but there's only one character that Shonda Rhimes regrets killing, and it's not a main character.
item.content:encoded: Grey’s Anatomy has stood out for its mix of drama and comedy but also because of how badly it tends to handle its characters’ departures, often opting for killing them, and when it comes to Dylan's death, Grey's Anatomy creator Shonda Rhimes said she regrets killing him off of the show. Led by Meredith Grey (Ellen Pompeo), Grey’s Anatomy follows the lives of surgical interns, residents, and attendings at Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital (originally Seattle Grace Hospitals) as they do their best to juggle their personal and professional lives, making way for a lot of drama inside and outside the hospital.

item.title: Why Spaced's U.S. Remake Upset Simon Pegg & Edgar Wright
item.dc:creator: Mark Donaldson
item.description: U.S. remakes of UK sitcoms rarely work, even if they reach out to the creators for approval, something that wasn't done with McG's Spaced remake.
item.content:encoded: The U.S. remake of Simon Pegg, Jessica Hynes, and Edgar Wright's Spaced seriously upset the creators of the original UK sitcom. In 2008, Spaced joined a long list of beloved UK sitcoms to receive the dubious honor of being remade for American audiences. While The Office's U.S. remake became a massive hit for network NBC, most U.S. remakes of UK sitcoms don't fair quite so well. One of the things that The Office remake had going for it was the involvement of creators Ricky Gervais and Stephen Merchant, something that was apparently not done for Fox's Spaced remake.

item.title: The Real Reason Why Super Mario Brosâ€™ Lumalee Star Is Soâ€¦ Grim
item.dc:creator: Kayleena Pierce-Bohen
item.description: The Super Mario Bros. Lumalee star that's trapped in Bowser's castle is super cute but also has a dark side, and there's a reason it's so grim.
item.content:encoded: Warning: This movie contains spoilers for The Super Mario Bros. Movie!The Super Mario Bros. Movie features a lot of legacy characters from the popular gaming franchise including Lumalee, who has a perfect reason for being such a grim character. Lumalee first appears in a cage along with the Penguin King in Bowser's castle after Luigi gets captured, and explains that the only way Luigi can ever hope to get out is through "the sweet relief of death." Not only does this make Luigi highly uncomfortable, but it also makes him even more afraid of what's going to happen to him while he waits to be reunited with Mario, whose visit to the Mushroom Kingdom is much more welcoming.

item.title: 8 Avengers: Endgame Problems The MCU Still Needs To Address
item.dc:creator: Kai Young
item.description: Avengers: Endgame left many loose ends from the MCU's Infinity Saga, some of which haven't yet been resolved in subsequent Marvel Studios projects.
item.content:encoded: The MCU's Infinity Saga came to a close with the epic Avengers: Endgame, though the Phase 3 project left many loose ends unresolved. Marvel Studios spent over a decade building up to the events of Avengers: Infinity War and Avengers: Endgame, with every project from 2008's Iron Man onwards informing the dramatic storyline that unfolded over the Russo Brothers' two-part Infinity Saga spectacular. The Phase 3 films neatly wrapped up many storylines, specifically those involving the six original members of the Avengers, but Endgame also set the stage for the onset of the Multiverse Saga and left a lot up to audience interpretation.

item.title: Resident Evil 4 Remake's 5 Most Annoying Changes
item.dc:creator: Joanna Koziol
item.description: Capcom's latest reboot breathes fresh life into the beloved title, but the worst changes in the RE4 remake can bog down the experience somewhat.
item.content:encoded: Although most of the adjustments made to the Resident Evil 4 remake have proved beneficial, there are a few that the title - and players - certainly could have gone without. By nature, the survival horror game isn't meant to be the most pleasant experience, sending Leon on a difficult and oftentimes grotesque journey through the rural village to save a kidnapped Ashley. As such, it's no surprise that he runs into a few enemies and Plaga-infested nuisances along the way. However, the RE4 remake's most annoying changes not only make the journey frustrating from a narrative perspective, but also gameplay-wise.

item.title: Batman Cosplay Brings His Impossible Hellbat Armor To Life
item.dc:creator: Brian Colucci
item.description: Batman's Hellbat armor is one of the most powerful suits he's ever created, with a new cosplay finding a way to adapt it into live-action perfectly!
item.content:encoded: In DC Comics, Batman has more wardrobe change options than anyone in his shared comic universe, with his most badass and overpowered armor set, the Hellbat, getting a cosplay that nails the impossible task of bringing it to life in the most comic-accurate way!

item.title: Law & Order: SVU Season 24 Finale To Bring Back Rollins For Surprise Twist
item.dc:creator: Ana Dumaraog
item.description: New details about Law & Order: SVU season 24 finale have been revealed including the return of Amanda Rollins with an interesting plot twist.
item.content:encoded: Amanda Rollins is returning to the Law & Order: SVU season 24 finale with unexpected news. After more than a decade on the NBC police procedural, Kelli Giddish left the series back in December 2022. Not long after that, however, the dependable and feisty Rollins is already set to come back and reunite with her old co-workers.

item.title: The Mandalorian Season 3 Episode 7: 20+ Easter Eggs & Hidden Details
item.dc:creator: Lewis Glazebrook
item.description: The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 delivers one of the show's biggest episodes to date, providing plenty of hidden details and Star Wars Easter eggs.
item.content:encoded: Warning! This article contains spoilers for The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7.The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 delivers an Earth-shattering episode for the Mando-universe, bringing plenty of Easter eggs, references, and hidden details pertaining to the broader Star Wars universe. After the somewhat divisive "Chapter 22: Guns For Hire", The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 delivers one of the show's most story-intensive episodes to date. It opens with Katee Sackhoff's Bo-Katan Kryze successfully uniting the different groups of Mandalorians, leading them on a mission to retake Mandalore.

item.title: Jedi: Survivor's Town Hubs Prove Cal Is A Truer Jedi Than Luke
item.dc:creator: Fletcher Varnson
item.description: Star Wars Jedi: Survivorâ€™s Cal Kestis may not be as accomplished as Grand Master Luke Skywalker, but new town hub missions will make him a truer Jedi.
item.content:encoded: In comparison to a Master like Luke Skywalker, Star Wars Jedi: Survivor's Cal Kestis may seem more like the small town nobody Luke once was. The Padawan never got to graduate from his apprenticeship status before Order 66, and was forced to live in exile until being discovered by Inquisitors. In contrast, Luke studied under two of the most talented Jedi Masters, became the de facto Grand Master after defeating the Empire, and was part of the strongest force-wielding lineage ever. Indeed, Cal's achievements seem insignificant when placed beside those of Luke's. But Jedi: Survivor's new town hub feature will show that Cal is a truer Jedi than Luke even if he isn't as powerful or accomplished.

item.title: The Imperial Shadow Council Explained: Essential Canon Team That Shapes The Galaxy
item.dc:creator: Kevin Erdmann
item.description: Star Wars has just revealed the Imperial Shadow Council, a major coalition essential in shaping the galaxy's future after the original trilogy.
item.content:encoded: Warning! This post contains SPOILERS for The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7

item.title: Moff Gideon's Mandalorian-Inspired Armor (& Darth Maul Horns) Explained
item.dc:creator: Corey Larson
item.description: Moff Gideonâ€™s new Mandalorian-inspired beskar armor in The Mandalorian is subtly designed to mock his enemies by dragging up their worst memories.
item.content:encoded: Warning! SPOILERS for The Mandalorian, season 3, episode 7.The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 shows Giancarlo Esposito finally donning Mandalorian-inspired armor as Moff Gideon. It’s bitterly ironic for the man who was almost single-handedly responsible for obliterating the Mandalorian race to then model his look after them. Despite admiring and studying their culture, Gideon still persecuted and hated the Mandalorians for their strength. Up till now, it seemed like it wasn’t in Gideon’s character to try and emulate others, especially given the fact that he adamantly denounces Thrawn's return in The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7. Nevertheless, his donning of Mandalorian-inspired armor reveals a deeper longing of his that has finally surfaced.

item.title: "YOOOOOO!" Breaking Bad's Skinny Pete Actor In The Mandalorian Makes Fans Lose Their Minds
item.dc:creator: Lewis Glazebrook
item.description: The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 has many shocking moments, though none are impacting fans like the cameo from Breaking Badâ€™s Skinny Pete.
item.content:encoded: This article contains spoilers for The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7.The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 is making many fans lose their minds over the inclusion of another Breaking Bad actor: Charles Baker who plays Skinny Pete in the AMC acclaimed series. In The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7, Bo-Katan Kryze, Din Djarin, and the rest of the crew land on Mandalore to reclaim the planet. There, they encounter a group of Mandalorians who have survived by roaming the planet's surface, with one of the characters played by Baker.

item.title: Every Unlockable Accessory in Resident Evil 4 Remake (& What They Do)
item.dc:creator: Matthew Danielson
item.description: Every unlockable accessory in Resident Evil 4 Remake can be gained to either change game mechanics or provide a new look for either Leon or Ashley.
item.content:encoded: Along with costumes, unlockable accessories are available for players in Resident Evil 4 Remake to either provide small changes to gameplay or change Leon or Ashley's look during the game. With nearly 21 different accessories to unlock, there are plenty of items for players to get that can alter the aesthetic of the game's main characters. However, these cosmetic pieces are not given for free, having concrete goals that must be met to earn them.

item.title: "Are You Kidding Me?!" The Mandalorian Fans React To Paz Vizslaâ€™s Big Episode 7 Scene
item.dc:creator: Thomas Bacon
item.description: The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 features an unforgettable scene involving Paz Vizsla, leaving fans reacting in shock and outrage--!
item.content:encoded: This article contains spoilers for The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7.Fans have reacted with shock to the fate of Paz Vizsla in The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7. The story of The Mandalorian has been building to a logical climax, one in which the Mandalorians attempted to reclaim their homeworld. Viewers had long assumed the resettlement wouldn't go well, and some even theorized the truth; that the Empire had claimed Mandalore as a base. Worse still, it seems Moff Gideon had actually based himself around the Great Forge, a sacred place for the planet's inhabitants.

item.title: Roblox: Clicker Simulator Codes (April 2023)
item.dc:creator: Tim Comer
item.description: By redeeming codes in Roblox: Clicker Simulator, players can give themselves lots of useful buffs, including bonuses to Luck, Hatch and more.
item.content:encoded: Like many other popular Roblox experiences, Clicker Simulator features many codes that players can redeem for useful buffs, bonuses, and rewards. Clicker Simulator tasks players with becoming the best Clicker possible by exploring new worlds, hatching pets, and trading with friends, all to maximize the number of clicks they can make on their screens. By getting buffs, bonuses, and rewards from codes, players can give themselves an easier time when it comes to rising through the leaderboards.

item.title: Star Wars Completes The Darksaber Timeline With Moff Gideon Twist
item.dc:creator: Corey Larson
item.description: The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 finally reveals exactly how Moff Gideon got the Darksaber from Bo-Katan Kryze during the Purge of Mandalore.
item.content:encoded: Warning! SPOILERS for The Mandalorian, season 3, episode 7.The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 reveals how Giancarlo Esposito's Moff Gideon first managed to get his hands on the Darksaber, thus filling the last gap in its history. Now that the mystery has been revealed, a nearly unbroken line of wielders can be traced all the way back from Star Wars: The Clone Wars to The Mandalorian. After first being forged by Tarre Vizsla, the Darksaber was reclaimed by his descendant, Pre Vizsla, during The Clone Wars era. From there, Darth Maul rightfully won the blade by defeating Vizsla in single combat, becoming one of the first non-Mandalorian to wield the Darksaber.

item.title: How To Increase Vanguard Rank Fast In Destiny 2 (Farming Location)
item.dc:creator: Bruno Yonezawa
item.description: Grinding with the intention of leveling Vanguard ranks can be tiring in Destiny 2. Hereâ€™s the best way to optimize your gains and save some time.
item.content:encoded: Raising the Vanguard level in Destiny 2 can be quite time-consuming, but there are ways of optimizing the grind and rising through the Vanguard Ranks faster. The Vanguard and its main Vendor, Zavala, have been around since the first game in the franchise, and while the ways that it works and grants rewards have significantly changed, players still engage in a few related activities to the Last City’s protectors.

item.title: How To Complete Wall-E Loves Flowers Quest In Dreamlight Valley
item.dc:creator: Tim Comer
item.description: To complete the Wall-E Loves Flowers quest in Disney Dreamlight Valley, players must spend some time hanging out and picking flowers with Wall-E.
item.content:encoded: Disney Dreamlight Valley’s Pride of the Valley update has introduced the Wall-E Loves Flowers quest, which players can complete to earn a special furniture piece. The Pride of the Valley update gets players to celebrate the spring, and the Wall-E Loves Flowers quest also encourages players to celebrate the spirit of the season with a spot of flower-picking. However, players will find the game’s quest and tasks logs are light on details.

item.title: The Mandalorian Season 3, Episode 7 Ending Explained
item.dc:creator: Thomas Bacon
item.description: The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 comes to an explosive climax, setting up a stunning finale, the Ahsoka Disney+ TV show, and even the Mando movie!
item.content:encoded: This article contains spoilers for The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7.The Mandalorian season 3, episode 7 came to an explosive conclusion, finally revealing the true scale of the Imperial threat. The New Republic believed Palpatine's death was the beginning of the end for the Empire. As seen in Chuck Wendig's "Aftermath" trilogy, the Galactic Civil War lasted only another year afterward, as the Emperor initially lashed out in a fury before retreating to the planet Jakku for a final battle with the forces of the nascent New Republic. In the aftermath of the Battle of Jakku, the Republic signed a peace treaty on Coruscant.

item.title: Ted Lasso Just Ruined Any Hope For Keeley & Roy Getting Back Together
item.dc:creator: Cooper Hood
item.description: Ted Lasso season 3 ruins any hope for Keeley and Roy getting back together in the immediate future, as a kiss changes the romantic outlook for one.
item.content:encoded: Warning: Contains SPOILERS for Ted Lasso season 3, episode 5!Keeley kissing Jack in Ted Lasso season 3, episode 5 ruins any hope of her and Roy getting back together. Keeley and Roy's relationship was a central storyline for the first two seasons of Ted Lasso, but it was really in season 2 that the show explored how great they were together. The reveal in Ted Lasso season 3's premiere that Roy and Keeley broke up created questions about what the future held for the couple. But since their relationship was so strong before and Ted Lasso is ending with this season, there has been an expectation that the series will explore how the two characters find their way back together.

item.title: How To Find Perdition Lost Sector In Destiny 2
item.dc:creator: Bruno Yonezawa
item.description: Players may need to challenge the Perdition Lost Sector, depending on the Legend and Master rotation. Hereâ€™s where to find it and how to beat it.
item.content:encoded: Destiny 2’s Perdition Lost Sector may be challenging to find if players do not know exactly where to look. Lost Sectors are the shooter’s interpretation of mini-dungeons and present a short challenge that, when finished, grants rewards to players. These should not be confused with the game’s actual Dungeons, which are lengthier and harder activities that drop more powerful rewards. Of course, there are also Legend and Mastery difficulties of Lost Sectors that make it equally or even more challenging than Dungeons.

item.title: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Review: Remastered Memories
item.dc:creator: Carrie Lambertsen
item.category: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection
item.description: All 10 mainline games for the Mega Man Battle Network series are included in this compilation with rare content, extras, and a new mode.
item.content:encoded: Almost twelve years after the launch of the first game in the series, the Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection is being released as a massive collection of all 10 mainline games, freshly remastered and with extra content and even a new mode added. Developed and published by Capcom, this set of games allows fans of the originals as well as new players to experience the series on the Nintendo Switch, PS4, or PC. The collection even gives the ability to smooth those pixelated edges with an optional high-resolution filter.

item.title: 5 Letter Words Wordle Hasn't Used Yet (Updated Daily)
item.dc:creator: Lindsay Cutone
item.description: Wordle, the popular word-guessing game hosted by The New York Times, has over 1,700 words remaining as possible solutions.
item.content:encoded: Wordle, the five-letter word guessing game that has taken the world by storm, challenges players each day to figure out the winning word. Since its release in 2021, Wordle has become immensely popular on social media and has even inspired variations of the game including Quordle, Octordle, and, for math lovers, Nerdle.

item.title: Every Wordle Answer: All Words Used So Far (Updated Daily)
item.dc:creator: William Cennamo
item.description: Wordle is a simple daily word game that has taken the internet by storm. With only 6 chances to get the right answer, players may need a little help.
item.content:encoded: Wordle is a simple word-guessing game that tasks players with solving a five-word puzzle using letter position clues. Wordle presents the player with six rows of five empty boxes. Simply enter a random five-letter word and the website highlights certain letters green if they are correct, yellow if they are correct but in the wrong spot, or grey if they are not in the word at all. With this information, players need to try to figure out the word within the six guesses to be successful.

item.title: Wordle 662: April 12, 2023 Hints & Answer
item.dc:creator: William Cennamo
item.description: Each day brings a brand new Wordle puzzle for fans to solve. Here are today's hints, and fully spoiled answer, to today's Wordle.
item.content:encoded: A brand new Wordle word is available for fans to solve and we've got the hints, and spoiled answers, to help out those struggling. For anyone new to the game, Wordle is a simple, once-a-day, word guessing game that tasks players with solving a five-letter word within six guesses. Each attempt is rewarded with hints that show if a letter is in the right position, the wrong position, or in the word at all. Using these hints players can hopefully deduce the correct answer within the allotted tries.

item.title: Game Of Thrones: Why King Tommen Killed Himself In Season 6
item.dc:creator: Kara Hedash
item.description: King Tommen Baratheon memorably fell to his death in Game of Thrones season 6, but a number of different factors played a part in his suicide.
item.content:encoded: King Tommen Baratheon's death in Game of Thrones season 6 finale may have been by his own hand, but Tommen's suicide was sparked by circumstances beyond the sudden death of his wife. Callum Wharry played the youngest son of Cersei Lannister until the role of Tommen was recast with Dean-Charles Chapman for season 4. Tommen emerged as the heir to the Iron Throne shortly afterward, but the pressures of his family and the surrounding tension among Westerosi powers eventually got the best of the young king. Tommen's death came in episode 10 of season 6, and is one of the most tragic ends for a Game of Thrones character.

item.title: The 10 Most Heartwarming Body-Swap Comedy Movies
item.dc:creator: Emma Street
item.description: Body-swap comedies aren't just hilarity and high jinks. The characters' life-changing experiences can provide some truly heartwarming moments too.
item.content:encoded: The best Body-swap comedies can be romantic or terrifying, but mostly they are played for laughs. Strictly speaking, a body-swap movie is one where there is an exchange between two people. However, the term is also applied to movies where characters become a different (usually older or younger) version of themselves. They provide actors with the opportunity to play completely against type - and, often, against age or gender. While there's usually plenty of wackiness and hi-jinks in body-swap comedies, there are also frequently moments of real tenderness and emotion.

item.title: Whatâ€™s on TV Tonight - TV Listings
item.dc:creator: Kevin Pantoja
item.description: Get today's TV schedule for the best primetime shows, movies, and more. Here's your guide for what to watch tonight on all your favorite channels.
item.content:encoded: Back To Top
